thread.title: Basigi demands $5000 balance payment for leading Black Queens to historic gold at All Africa Games
thread.title_full: Basigi demands $5000 balance payment for leading Black Queens to historic gold at All Africa Games

title: Basigi demands $5000 balance payment for leading Black Queens to historic gold at All Africa Games
text:
Sports News | 13 October 2015 03:55 CET Basigi demands $5000 balance payment for leading Black Queens to historic gold at All Africa Games - www.ghanasoccernet.com Black Queens coach Yusif Basigi 
Coach Yusif Basigi is demanding a balance payment of $5000 for leading Ghana to clinch a historic gold in Women's soccer at the 2015 All Africa Games. 
Basigi was rightly handed $10,000 by officials of the Sports Ministry acting on instructions given by President John Mahama to have the initial $2000 reward for the team topped up to $5000. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
